name: study1_cohort
title: Hospitalized Patients with Primary Diagnosis of Heart Failure
description: The cohort includes patients aged 18 or above admitted to the hospital with heart failure as the primary diagnosis code.

entity.name: pid
entity.description: A unique identifier assigned to each patient in the cohort.

entity.name: encounterId
entity.description: A unique identifier for each hospital encounter/stay.

entry.name: patientEncounter
entry.description: Captures hospital encounters when a patient is admitted for care.

period.description: Includes all hospital encounters for the defined cohort population.

eligibility.name: adultsWithHeartFailure
eligibility.description: Filters patients older than 18 years old at the time of admission, and with a diagnosis of heart failure during the hospital encounter.
